website_summaries.verdict: Great value wet and dry cordless rotary shaver with accessories for nose hair trimming and detailing stubble, beards, sideburns, and more.
pros: Three rotating floating heads give a precise and close-cut shave whether you're shaving wet or dry
Comes with a brush to remove excess hairs from the blades
Eight-hour charge on the included charging stand results in 45-minute shave time
cons: Long charge time for full battery

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: I change my original rating from one star to five stars as the problem I experienced has been corrected by the seller without me even asking. Apparently I had a short in the charging wire when they saw my 1 star rating they immediately contacted me apologized and have sent me a new one. The razor itself is extremely good it shaves better than any razor I've ever had so I give it now 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: charles r smisek

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver. Outstanding Battery Life. OK Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Shaves as closely as a Norelco at more than 2x the price. Shaves light-years better than the 2yo Norelco 9000 series shaver-trimmer system it replaces. The trimmer is only OK, but that isn't why I bought it. Battery life exceeds all my expectations. In a week, I'd use ~35% of Norelco 9000 shaver. This shaver uses ~10% of battery in same time period!!! I'm astounded at battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Norelco!
customer_reviews.text: I had used Norelco razors for over 60 years--until they came out with those total junk replacement heads. For a time I switched back to a regular razor then saw an ad for RQ12 Pro. While researching that, I came across the Phisco. As the cost of the Phisco was less than the RQ12 Pro replacement head, I decided to try it. Could not be happier! Quiet, smooth and comfortable. I have only been using it for about 2 months now so hoping it will hold up. I highly recommend this razor for everyone who liked Norelco before their quality went to hell.
customer_reviews.author: Pork Chop

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding! The best shaver I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of paying exorbitant prices for replacement blades for my "Name Brand" rotary shaver, and decided to give the Phisco a try. The shaver came in a beautiful presentation box, fully charged, and I used it daily for a month before I had to recharge it! I get a shave at least as close and comfortable as the "Name Brand" shaver and I have the satisfaction of knowing that replacement blades for the Phisco cost a third of price of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Marvinn

customer_reviews.title: This is the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased Hatteker Electric dual head wet shaver. it is a knockoff of this razor. The Hattekar stopped working in less than a month, the coating came off, and the battery counts down by 10s and lasts about 6 shaves. This Phisco razor counts down by 1% at a time and gets about 50 shaves per charge and has no sign of the coating coming off. Interestingly, the Hattekar has no support or warranty and Amazon does not allow me to rate their product even though I purchased it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on replacing my old norelco with this or something from Costco, etc. For $39 bucks, this thing is better than my Norelco! I have replaced the blades in my over the years, it still works but just didnt give me a close shave. First time out with this bad boy and boom! Worked perfect! I have had it for 2 weeks, use it about every other day or so and still at 85% charged.
customer_reviews.author: thedubc

customer_reviews.title: Unlike what I first thought it is actually a very good shaver for the price
customer_reviews.text: Initially when I heard the motor because it did not buzz as I was used to with my other shavers I thought it was not a very strong shaver and quickly shaved a two day beard and thought it was not effective. Later when I took the time to shave with it noticed it actually makes a close shave, smooth shave and is strong. Its charging is easy and durable; plus it has a quality look. I would recommend it but take your time to realize it is effective in spite of its quiet motor that may appear weak at first try.
customer_reviews.author: Guive

customer_reviews.title: stylish and nice design. It is running very smooth on skin
customer_reviews.text: From the first look itself it’s impressive. Solid,stylish and nice design. It is running very smooth on skin. Works for both wet and dry trimming, I liked wet saving. One nice thing is that we can know the % charged. It will help to charge before use without disruption. It has clipper to adjust moustache and side burns. Charges very quick and running for longer time. Product also has a bag to carry during travel 😊. Price wise also cheaper compare to branded trimmers. I really loved it and recommend it too...
customer_reviews.author: Nabin

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised by the quality of the razor based on how much it cost.
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and great razor. I'm surprised by the quality of the razor based on how much it cost. Before purchasing the Phisco I spent 3x more for razor that didn't work. It comes in a stylish package and has a slick design. It shaves great, but you may be little sensitive to it a first. I highly recommend this razor for the average joe.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: First electric razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric razor and I am pleased with it. Everything I read said it takes time to get used to it, so I am not expecting miracles but so far it's much more soothing than traditional razors. The build feels solid and the USB charger means that I dont have to worry about a cord when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dean

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful shaver
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is the smoothest, quietest, and finest shaver I have ever used. I love the digital readout showing the battery level at all times. It even tells me when to clean it. Its waterproof too! It fits in the hand so much better than the Braun shaver I used before. Thus shaver is much lighter also and cuts well. The pop-up up trimmer works fine also. This Phisco shaver is a wonderful value for the money and I got free shipping from Amazon too! I woukd recommend this shaver to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: anthony vecchio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaver. I am in my 40's and have used an electric shaver for most of my life. I have spent a lot of money on name brand shavers but this one is the best so far. Finally a standard charging solution! Excellent idea. Not needing a special cord to charge my shaver is so nice. And the shaver does an excellent job. I am extremely happy with this purchase. If you need an electric shaver, just buy it. Awesome charging solution, great battery, fast and powerful motor, great shave and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was excellent
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem after three months with the on off button. Wrote to support and they wanted the shaver to study what the problem was. Support stayed in constant contact with me. And replaced the old shaver with a brand new one. Customer service was excellent. Do not hesitate to buy this shaver
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Orth

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this shaver
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this shaver. I compare it to my Norelco and it seems to perform as well or better. I have to wait and see if it holds up as well as my Norelco though. It is very much like my current shaver, but has a little more power. I'll post again after a few months of use. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: L'wood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: One fell off the shelf in the bathroom and broke beyond repair. I’d hsd it for a while so whatever. Bought a second one and same thing happened a day later. It’s not a bad razor but I don’t understand how it can be permanently broken after falling 4 feet. Not durable at all
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Angie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Edit 3: I bought this machine to reduce my shaving time but all I had was a longer and painful process. You have to go over the same area a lot of times for to get a clean shave (and it wouldn't be that clean) and it hurts a lot while shaving the neck, and left me with red stains for the whole day after I'm done with shaving. After my first review, I've been contacted be customer support for a refund, however, they sent a replacement that I gave another try but it was as bad. Now I'm back to the razor blade and I have my two machines in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Anas Buhayh

customer_reviews.title: A third for nice packaging. The packaging reminded me of that of ...
customer_reviews.text: One star for low noise (compared to my panasonic ES8103S). One for quality. A third for nice packaging. The packaging reminded me of that of an Apple product. Unfortunately shaving didn't work for me. Blades don't seem sharp enough so shaving was painful. Or they may not be fast enough. Maybe it's my beard.
customer_reviews.author: Stoke

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Razor worked great until it just died after several weeks of use. Was in contact with the seller who promised to replace it. Sent it back on my dime and never heard from them again, and they will no longer answer my contacts. Other reviews say it shaves well and it does for the price. Just hope yours doesn't die so soon or you'll just be burning money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: This product was not as discribed
customer_reviews.text: Shaver came to me 100% charged. I charged it overnight anyway prior to use. the following morning I decided to try the new shaver and was very disappointed. after shaving in one small spot in a circular motion for about 30 seconds the shaver failed to cut. only about 10 whiskers went inside the shaver after use. Also the battery dropped to 95% charge after running for 30 seconds. It is already boxed up, return label in place and headed back.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Bonser

customer_reviews.title: Not the smoothest shave.
customer_reviews.text: This shaver does not cut very close, and with even a little stubble, takes me several passes to get to the skin; and even then, it's not a very smooth shave. It may just be the way my facial hair is, but my old Braun did better. It is very easy to clean and the waterproof feature is nice. The battery charge display is nice to have as well. For about forty dollars, it's okay, I suppose. If you need to shave every one or two days, I would just pay more to get a big name brand shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After being a lifelong Norelco user, I got tired of how quickly the less expensive Norelcos got dull, and the way the top of the shaver would come off during cleaning and become a real pain to put back together. After some months of use this unit still does a better job of shaving than a brand new Norelco. The batter charge lasts for several months, and cleaning it is a breeze. Also love the read out that tells us how much charge is left. After using this, I can't imagine going back to a Norelco. I was worried about the wash/dry cleaning, but no problem getting it wet. Plus for the price it's a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hanson

customer_reviews.title: There is no much noise and trims beautifully. I have used it like 5 times and ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no much noise and trims beautifully. I have used it like 5 times and battery is at 95% ...wish it's water prove also I didn't shave my beard just shaved hair little above the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: Phisco Brand Mens Shaver Vs Philips Norelco 7310XL Mens Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Phisco was packaged very well and electrically functioned well. Its ability to shave well is my issue. My 7310XL at almost twenty years old shaves much better. The Phisco and all Norelco shavers I've owned over many years have a problem with the blade cover staying on. The 7310XL is discontinued and has been such a good shaver that I saw only one on ebay at $125.00. I'm checking with Norelco to see if they have a completely rebuilt 7310XL available. Update 10-13-2019 It's rare that any supplier will go to the extent that this supplier did to satisfy me. Full refund and they tracked the process to make sure I received it. Can't ask for anything better that that.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Williams

customer_reviews.title: A Close Shave For a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: As a Norelco user who grew weary of expensive, and poor quality replacement blades and a Braun 7 where I was paying $25-$35 every three months for a good quality replacement, I wanted a less expensive razor, and replacement blades. This razor fit the bill. The razor comes 100% charged and ready to shave. My first shave used 2% of the battery. Pro’s Close shave Comfortable to hold Quiet USB Charging Replacement blades $15 same blades as original not a cheap worthless replacement Con’s Made in China
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, didn’t work for me or my husband
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t cut at all for my husbands facial hair. He tried it dry and wet. I thought maybe his hairs were too coarse for it so I tried it myself on my fine hairs and it also didn’t work. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking razor. Great packaging. Its a quiet, elegant experience.
customer_reviews.text: This razor looks very expensive and has some really nice looking packaging. It is very shiny. I am not being humorous, it is really shiny and cool looking, like its a Lamborghini or something. Shaves just fine. Its a quiet-sounding razor. It does not feel like you are taking a 15 amp power tool to your face to grind the stubble off. Its just a quiet, elegant experience. It can be held under the water for cleaning, which is really cool, too. From the power meter on the handle, it looks like I will get about 12 shaves before I will have to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: InformedCitizen

customer_reviews.title: Worst shaver ever
customer_reviews.text: Paid for brand new, got used with hair in tub. Well, I decided to clean and use. Within few weeks, just outside of return window, screeching noise that just won't go away. Contacted manufacturer, that never ever responded. Problem continues with shaver and now not even working properly but no one from manufacturer responding. Amazon says out of return period so contact manufacturer. In viscous circle. I always buy Philips and Norelco. First time gave a shot to this brand based on reviews. It's ok when sometimes someone gets a lemon but it's not ok to have bad customer service. Chinese?
customer_reviews.author: Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Long run life and easy on the skin and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: My face was getting very irritated using a 4 blade razor so my dermatologist suggested I try an electric razor. I was looking for one with a long battery life and easy to clean. Finding this electric razor , it’s everything I was looking for. First charge lasts for weeks and my skin is finally healing. So easy to clean-just run it under warm water when you are finished shaving (I open the razor compartment and run water in the compartment and razor heads, then leave it open to dry after wiping it out. I’m very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this electric razor!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good Shaver, no charger.
customer_reviews.text: So, the charger relies on a USB charging cable. It does not ship with a charger, just the cord, so it is for travel, yet unless you are carrying around a device with a USB charging port, you can not even charge the device. It is as easy to clean as any other electric shaver, it shaves well, it comes with a 100% charge. But unless you have a spare charger laying around or a way to plug it into a USB port that can charge, you can not charge the device without going out and buying a charging plug adapter. Will remember this for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: So Good, I Bought Two
customer_reviews.text: After owing this razor for a month, I bought a second one, just so I can shave in either bathroom. Shaving has gone from a chore to just something I have to remember to do. The razor holds its charge for weeks. It gives quick close shaves. It is not as close as foam and a razor, but it is so much easier that I just shave more often. It is easy to clean, but I found a long handled stenciling paint brush works much better than the tiny plastic bristle brush which comes with the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this razor for almost five months now and the blades are still going strong. I mostly use this on my dome because I shave my head. I wouldn't say it "Shaves as Close as a Blade" but it works pretty darn good especially during those times I skip a few days. A quick once over with the Phisco does the trick and if I want it super smooth that's when I break out the razorblade. For the price, quality, ease of use (It's waterproof and works great in the shower) easy to clean and long batter life, this is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: PatatoWhiskey22

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product all the way around!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son in law put a Norelco on his Christmas wish list. So I started looking. Cannot beat the price here! If it only lasts a few years, then he has got his money back. I am even thinking of buying one for me! I had to replace the NiCad re-chargeable batteries in mine a while back and it was nearly half this price for the old technology batteries! The Son-in-law is totally happy with his shave. I warned him about a break-in period with new blades but he has had no problem. Seems to cut just fine and he is happy as can be!
customer_reviews.author: FatMilkDud

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've used it four times so far. It gives a pretty close shave but not as close as a traditional razor. I'm not sure any electric razor can give you the same closeness as an actual razor. The battery life is really good. It came with 100% and after four shaves it's at 66%. It cleans up nicely and doesn't irritate my face at all. Overall a good purchase and I'm happy that I bought it. I guess the only question now is how long will it last before it dies or malfunctions. If and when it happens I'll post an update. It's nice not to have to deal with water and shaving cream though.
customer_reviews.author: Dewboy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Norelco
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Norelco with this and not quite as good. The Norelco seemed to run at a higher speed and took about half the time to shave. I have to go over the same areas three-four times to get as clean as my Norelco. OK, for the price I guess. Will continue to use it, just wake up a minute earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Landru

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor at Best Price!
customer_reviews.text: This razor shaves just as good and even better than the brand name ones. The price is amazing for the shaving quality it provides. I recommend this product if you're looking for a smooth shave at a good price. The battery life is very long, and the charging time to 100% is very short. I have sensitive skin, but have no irritation. It glides smoothly across the skin and leaves no stubble behind.. You should try this razor. I think you'll be very happy. Even the packaging is elegant and impressive.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver ever
customer_reviews.text: This shavers speed is significantly better than my name brand shaver. It also has ridiculously large battery with the pro of being charged with micro USB makes it superior to my brand name shaver. Its quality is beyond my expectations and quickly replaced my name brand one as my main. I mean 2 week battery, 1hr charge from dead, and micro USB. With speed and quality to boot. What's not to love
customer_reviews.author: arthus

customer_reviews.title: Better than Norelco
customer_reviews.text: After years using the Phillips Norelco (2 of 'em) and changing blades annually, I decided to switch to see if the other reviews were accurate. I am impressed to say the least with the Phisco. When used with a little shaving cream you get a shave as close as a razor minus the nicks. Try one and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Gant

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use in shower, with a close shave
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of days for my beard area to acclimate to the shaver, but since them it has been smooth sailing. I have a light beard, have used it daily, in the shower, for about 3 weeks, and it has just dropped below 50% power. Easy to clean, a smooth shave, I really appreciate the wet capabilities, and it handles just fine. I haven't used it as a travel shaver and probably won't, but it comes with a cloth bag for that purpose. This is a quiet, smooth, and close shaver.
customer_reviews.author: S. Armistead

customer_reviews.title: Great shave, great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I've been hesitant to buy an electric razor for a while. Some of the ones I've had in the past were pretty lackluster. I wanted something to shave my face and keep my head nice and smooth and couldn't decide on one, so I took a chance on this product. I am blown away. I've had it for a couple months and use it almost daily, and I've only had to charge it once. I am extremely happy with my purchase. If you need something low maintenance that will keep your face, neck, or noggin nice and smooth......I've been pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Heid

customer_reviews.title: broke after two months use
customer_reviews.text: never dropped, always well cared for. Was seated at desk shaving when suddenly the head just broke. Trying to find warranty information to get replacement but the "click here" link takes me no where. Two stars for now, the razor shaves nicley but break easily and support seems difficult to find. Will update if i can find a way to get support.
customer_reviews.author: Ulquiorra424

customer_reviews.title: Charger not included
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are quite positive at first glance but I have two concerns. First and foremost, from the description it is not made clear that there is no charger included with the razor. Maybe being able to charge the razor with a cell phone charger is a selling point but it was not made clear, at least to me, that a charger is not included. Second, if you read a lot of reviews you begin to get the impression that the razor has a tendency to fail after 6 months. Don’t have enough evidence to say this is the case, but it is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Truckzilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice shave, outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: This shaver works at least as well for me as my Norelcos, and between the digital battery life indicator and the flip-out trimmer, it has features you have to go to the high-end Norelcos to get. Plus it charges with USB rather than a proprietary brick. All for a really good price. I waited a few shaves to make sure I liked it before writing a review just to be sure. It’s a winner, and the Norelcos are going in the drawer. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good razor so far.
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time Norelco user. My last one lasted about 3 yrs until the head basically fell apart. Right now I didnt have a lot of money to spend on another Norelco and came across this one. For the past three weeks I have been pretty impressed by this razor. No pulling, smooth shave, easy to clean, and still working on the original charge. I realize I am only 3 weeks in to using this razor and havent had to replace the blades yet. If anything changes I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: ffmedic

customer_reviews.title: WOw, they did it
customer_reviews.text: After just 9 months the shaver was acting wonky. I contacted them and they sent a new razor replacement just like their warranty said. This is great given how this could have ended. I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated on buying this razor as it wasn't a "name brand". It replaced a phillips/norelco 5 year old razor that stopped charging. I don't think I've ever had an electric razor that gave me this close of a shave. I do not have a very thick beard. But, this thing does and awesome job whether I'm shaving daily or a Monday shave after a weekend of not shaving. The battery is good. I've used it for a month and haven't charged it yet. I still have over 60% battery lift remaining. I'm not sure how long it will last, but it sure seems like a great quality product for the money. I am definitely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not the closest shave I've ever had, but easy to use and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my legs. I love the battery level display so I never have to run out of charge halfway through shaving. However, there's always a very find stubble left over, whether I use it wet or dry. Not enough to see, but enough to feel. I strongly recommend against using this on your armpits. The rotary shaver will hurt you, and the trimmer on the back is really a trimmer and not a shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Close Shave
customer_reviews.text: For the money you just can't beat the value and quality of this shaver. I had been using a 6 year old Norelco triple header and decided to buy a foil shaver. Well for me that was a mistake. My old Norelco with dull blades gave better results so I thought I'd try another triple header and saw this Phisco model. It was a great choice as now I'm really getting close shaves. I love the numeric readout for battery life and like the standard charger you would also have with you to charge your phones. Great idea! Can't speak to durability get as I have had it for only a week. But I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorofcats

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging and great support for an underwhelming product
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetics are great. The feel of the machine in your hand is good and the display is more advanced than similar products in a competitive price range. However, after several uses, the blades started making horrible sounding noises as if the tiny blades are touching and the close-to-the skin effect was gone. After 2 months of use, I've reverted to the old Philips Norelco I had intended to replace. After following up with Philco Support who picked up the ball and graciously handled my complaint, offered a satisfactory resolution to the problem, and addressed the issue, I believe the product warrants another star and a revisit as the model I tested was the basic entry level offering.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Iny

customer_reviews.title: Love to be able to charge via USB
customer_reviews.text: Love the LED display with battery life %. I keep one in the car and shave in traffic, its charged in the car also. I keep one at home. I have owned several big brand shavers in the past and they are expensive and don't seem to last long as i wear our shavers quickly. This is lasted more than a few months so far and it still works
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: Good, But "dead" within 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shaves until it mysteriously stopped working after 10 months. It claims to have ipx7 water resistance, which sounds great, but I would not advise allowing water to get in or around the charging port. I believe this is why no e has "died". Be very care careful when rinsing. I'll probably get another, as it's an amazing razor when it works, but be aware of the possibility of it failing due to water damage. Update: The company did refund my money without requiring me to send the product back so i am adding a star for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Marchbanks

customer_reviews.title: beats norelco hands down
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to review this as I wanted to make sure this worked as good as I thought it was. I have been using norelco for years, sometimes a remington shaver. This one shaves much better, cleaner, closer, & more comfortable. I can say that every aspect of what I look for in a shaver beats the norelco's. The shave is better, can use shaving cream or gel while shaving, works in shower if needed, clean up is easy, run time doubles the norelco, charge time from 50% to full has been about 15 minutes. I would definitely recommend this razor. Price and shipping was actually the same as my last norelco.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Chiappetta

customer_reviews.title: Going strong for  ore than 2 years daily use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shaver and the seller is asking a fair price with good customer relations. I just ordered a second shaver as they don' t like the shower, better suited for sink side use as the charging port can corrode and the shaver can accumulate water inside. After my second shaver arrived I took the first one apart and dried it out, now works good as new.
customer_reviews.author: paul perotti

customer_reviews.title: Battery has quit charging
customer_reviews.text: This razor provides a closer shave than the much higher priced brand it will remind you of. After three and a half months the razor quit charging properly. I contacted the seller and was very pleasantly surprised on the rapid response, three or four emails were exchanged. I returned the defective razor and supplied the tracking number via email, four days later I had a brand new razor. Best customer service ever and you will love this razor and it's price. Mine does double duty since I shave my head also. .
customer_reviews.author: VJB

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This electric shaver provides a closer and easier shave than any I've had before. For the price it's an outstanding value. It's quieter than any I've had before and from the reduced noise you'd think it's doing less work or cutting but it's really performing well! No strain on the pocket book at this price, get one and enjoy for your self.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & close shave
customer_reviews.text: I have had this electric shaver for about two weeks now and waited to review it until I got to use it more than just a couple of times . This razor looks and feels very well made . Very comfortable to use. I have thick & tough facial hair & it has given me a nice clise smooth shave each & every time with no pull. The battery holds up very well before having to charge it . The built in trimmers also work very well. I really don't have anything bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: James Owens

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly effective. When I turned it on for the first time and noticed the fairly low rpm, I thought it would be no good. I was mistaken. It won't give you a perfect razor blade shave, but it comes close. Fast, quiet, easy to clean and the battery charge lasts a long time. As one other reviewer has said, it arrived 100% charged! Measures up well when compared with low-end models from better know brands (Norelco, Panasonic) costing twice as much or more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After  two and a half months, I finally had to charge it!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, my best shaver ever!! The battery lasts forever. Granted, I don't shave every day, but my old Norelco died very quickly. Love the fact that I can travel without a separate charger. Cleaning is a breeze since you can just rinse out the whisker collection area. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bob dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Works great. This is my second one. I literally wore out the first one. Very comfortable to hold and lasts a very long time before you have to recharge it. Replacement blades are easy to find and not very expensive. Overall, a great shaver for the price. Works just as good if not better than the more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great company, helped me with my mistake
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for his birthday. Hoping to surprise him with a new razor after four years of his old one. I should have done more research or maybe asked what he would have liked. Long story short company helped me with my mistake, and now my husband has the razor he prefers. Thank you Lora at Phisco. Will buy from them again for my Dads birthday in February.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pauley

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of the as a travel razor because it charged with a micro USB cable and I didn’t need to pack a separate wall adapter. It was such a good razor that I replaced my daily razor for daily use. It shaves close, holds a charge for a long time, charges very fast, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic parts break- be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Update 4/15/2020 Contacted supplier and received a replacement- thanks! Update 3/24/2020 when cleaning last night, the shaver falls apart! Closer inspection shows the spring clip has broken off cheap plastic housing- not happy! 1/23/2019 My previous shaver gave up the ghost so I'm using this product to shave my head. Been using this product for about a week and seems to be working out well
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Coble

customer_reviews.title: Very good shaver
customer_reviews.text: This is my first shaver after about 20 years so have nothing to compare with. First thing first - that is no replacement for a razor, the end result is not the same and couldn't be compared. In general, device is cool, it is comfortable to hold and use, weight is just about it - very light, it does not get hot while using and it give pretty decent results. Very easy to clean. Waterproof - i actually cleaned it with water. Battery life is awesome , i've been using it since i got it without recharging it, i think 6 weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: Yuval Shaia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from Phisco support team.
customer_reviews.text: I actually had an issue with the original product I purchased (shaver was not holding a charge). I contacted Phisco customer service to see how I should proceed with repair or replacement of the Shaver. Lora from the Phisco support team promptly responded to my email and after determining that the unit was not working properly immediately sent out a replacement. I can not stress enough how impressed I was with Lora's commitment to resolving my issue in a timely manner. She truly epitomizes what good customer service is. Phisco should be proud to have an employee like her. By the way; the replacement shaver works perfectly. I am a very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charging Issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaver. Unfortunately as sometimes will happen in production runs, you get one a product with an issue. Fortunately when I reached out to the vendor and they made good on their warranty by replacing the defective shaver. I believe this to be a "one off" as I requested a new replacement instead of a refund because I really like the shaver. It works as advertised. This 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: mackarthur james

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect low priced electric razor
customer_reviews.text: I say this is almost a perfect machine. Better than any Norelco I've owned over my life, but the angle on the heads is a bit wide, if you have to shave hair in a narrow spot. Other than that, battery life is incredible, movement is smooth and confident, trimmer is excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Abrams

customer_reviews.title: This is quality and quiet, just received 100% charged so I shaved my face, it worked very good.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels very well constructed. Razor is quiet with very good operation when I tried it out on my face. I can't wait to see if the charge lasts a long time and if the razor still performs this smooth after years of use. I am satisfied with my choice to purchase a Phisco product at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mauck

customer_reviews.title: An okay item
customer_reviews.text: It works alright, though, I thought it would work much better than it actually does. It’ll get the job done, just doesn’t seem sharp enough. I went solely on reviews to determine whether to buy this product or not and it’s almost worth $40 in my opinion. It also doesn’t seem too durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good razor for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use for shaving my head and the first time the razor battery died before I was finished. This was because my hair was a little on the longer side for shaving, however the second time which was a few days later the shaver still had 95% left. I recommend this razor if you plan on using for the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: michael st louis

customer_reviews.title: Phisco Electric Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my old Norelco Electric Shaver and noticed that there were many shavers, made in China, advertised on Amazon. I chose this one because I can purchase new blades online for it and it had a good review. I have found that it does a great job trimming my moustache and shaving. It's very sharp and cuts well and cleanly. I'm very pleased with the purchase as it works better than my old Norelco.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 times
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my oldest son and now for my second oldest. They both like them a lot. Esp. the amount of charge indicator. Usually I would go for the 'standard' for shavers, Philips/Norelco, but these seem just as good, have the charge indicator and are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: treble101

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good or if not better than highly expensive brands! Been using this shaver for a month now and it gets easier and better with each use. I had "razor burn" the first 2 times but now, its a smooth clean shave and much faster than using my straight razor. Thank you Phisco!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mahanna

customer_reviews.title: Good design, but....
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of people, I was a long time Norelco user. I bought this shaver because I was trying to not have to spend $100+ on a new shaver. This shaver works, but it definitely is not a Norelco. Not horrible, but you get what you pay for. PROS: Lightweight Great battery life Easy to charge (micro USB) CONS: Does not give a good clean cut; Takes 8-10 passes to do a regular daily shave, and even then I can see/feel missed facial hair Seems to run slow - does not have the power of better shavers out there Head is flimsy - does not keep good contact with skin while shaving
customer_reviews.author: David A Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be nice razor
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used it enough for an objective review. However, it arrived in a classy box with bag and usb cord. The razor itself appears to be well made and, so far, works like it should. For the price I would say it was a good buy, but time will tell if it measures up to my 25 year old Norelco. D
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Morisse

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dependable product! I bought this shaver for my father, he loves it. He had an issue with the shaver lid, so I contacted customer service. They were extremely professional and responded quickly with a replacement lid! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: martie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great razor
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for well over a year and it continues to do a great job. However I dropped it a couple of months back and broke the silver surround on the head. Just a crack and it still works, but to much pressure while shaving and the blades come out...Super glue won't hold it, don't know why. And the only parts available are the blades themselves... Just hate to throw away a $40 shaver for a 12 cent piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!  The seller is very professional!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used an electric shaver as my main way of shaving for years. I liked the fact that this was cordless and wet/dry. The seller helped me with a replacement. I really appreciated the attentiveness and desire to meet my need. I’d recommend this product and the seller highly.
customer_reviews.author: Man in the West

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: I've used electric razors for more than 50 years. This is the best one I have used so far. It cuts better, and has features usually only found on the much more expensive razors.. Shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: LOWELL D. WAGGY

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: The shaver feels good in your hand. Love this shaver. It charges fast and lasts for many shaves between charges. It's relatively light-weight and comfortable to hold and use. It gives a pretty close shave and I did not experience much if any skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: amar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is an excellent travel shaver, super light weight, very energy efficient (minimum 3 shaves on one charge of the brand new battery, i have thick facial hair). It wasn't as close as a shave as I wanted for job interviews. Their customer service contacted me about this immediately with a refund offer.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Battery life display, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the trimmer is built into the side of the unit so you dont have to spend time removing and attaching pieces. The top flips up for easy cleaning. I also like the convenience of knowing how much battery life is left with the visual display. Works great for a daily shaver like myself.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Dominant hand in a cast: Elec Razor to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has his dominant hand in a cast & could not shave with his manual razor. I ordered this Phisco Elec Saver & it did the trick. He says the shave is not quite as close as with his hand razor but he is getting better at using it & is pleased with the results. The rotary blades give him a nice shave without issues from sensitive skin. Even with cast off it will be good for a quick shave.
customer_reviews.author: Buffs Mom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem after 3 months... contacted company via the warranty on their site. Got an immediate response and after sending short video of the problem received a new unit in 2 days. Be sure and register the warranty. Well priced product and great customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: justbarbara

customer_reviews.title: Just buy one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I'd been using the same Norelco since the late '70s...untill I dropped it. This had better reviews than much more expensive Norelcos so I thought I'd give it a try. I get a very comfortable, close shave. Battery lasts amost forever. I think I charge it every two or three weeks. And thats shaving morning and evening most days.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: 6 months old and no loger works or takes a charge
customer_reviews.text: I have had this 6 months, and it will no longer take a charge and it is dead. I tried 2 other chargers and cables to verify that it was not them. Very disappointed in this shaver, never shaved all that well in the first place and now it doesn't even work You get what you pay for that is for sure. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Russell

customer_reviews.title: Shaver works well
customer_reviews.text: I just shaved off 5 day old whiskers in a flash I wet the shaver and wet my beard and the whiskers were gone in less than 23 secs Not baby butt smooth but good enough A very good shaver the water is the trick
customer_reviews.author: S. L

customer_reviews.title: Geat razor.
customer_reviews.text: Gets 4 stars, would be 5 but the flip trimmer doesnt work that well. But the razor itself is great i like it alot, nice shave easy to clean battery lasts longer than any other one i had, fix the trimmer and they stike gold.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beats razors 5x the price across the board.
customer_reviews.text: Coming from 9000 Series Norelco this is much better. It's very quiet, provides a very close shave and the battery life lasts forever. Never again will I buy a $200 electric razor when these $40 ones are so much better. I could not be happier with this razor, I'm done with the Norelco gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Brett P.

customer_reviews.title: USB charger, does not require a separate charger for the razor
customer_reviews.text: A relatively inexpensive electric razor that does, at least for me, as good a job of shaving as my more expensive Norelco, plus does not require a separate charger, plugs into any USB charging port. I had an issue with getting the razor to connect for charging. At first it was intermittent, but finally I could not get the razor to charge. I contacted Phisco, they suggested a couple of possible solutions. Tried them, they did not work and they quickly sent me a replacement. So in summary, I am very happy with the razor, and very happy with the support.
customer_reviews.author: ROBW

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works good, however when the battery indicator gets down to about 90% it is basically dead. At 80% the unit wont even come on. This is not a problem because I keep it charged. Just funny the indicator is so inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It starts strong but doesn’t seem to last
customer_reviews.text: The razor has a good battery life (time wise) but doesn’t seem to operate at full strength throughout the charge - it seems weaker as the battery goes down. The razor worked well to start but in just under 5 months times I’ve noticed a considerable degradation in quality. Now I’m starting to hear a rattling noise. Time to find something new I’m afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Average Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you like a razor that pulls every single hair on your face, or if your trying to shave peach fuzz this is a good razor. Stay away from this thing, terrible for thicker...manly hair. It look cool, comes in a cool package. Besides that, it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a "brand name" shaver that was awkward to hold, gave me an inconsistent shave, and lost charge pretty quickly. I wish I had switched to this shaver years ago! It is light, fits really well in my hand, easy to use, and easy to clean. I have been using it a couple of weeks and it's still at 80% charge. When I eventually do need to charge it, I will just plug it into the nearest USB cable. Great work on the part of both the engineers and designers on this shaver!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: At the price of the razor I didn’t think it was going to be very heavy or very well though. Seems to be built very good materials the razor is fairly heavy and has a nice looking finish on it. Came 95% charged and only took a few minutes to get to 100%. After shaving with it I only used about 5% of the battery down to 95 plugged it in to recharge and it only took maybe five minutes to get it back to 100%. Shave quality was very good very happy with the purchase and would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Fred wene

customer_reviews.title: Great razor and price!
customer_reviews.text: Did much research and decided on this one. Great razor. I’ve had more expensive ones in the past. Quality and shave it gives is excellent. I have a fast growing and rough beard. This handles it no problem. Charge lasts all week. Has convienemt charge gauge and uses your phone wire (does not come with cube but not an issue.) Also waterproof, I use a little warm water and a small amount of shave cream, no burn at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin's Dream Come True
customer_reviews.text: Okay, at first I was going to complain about how much this is not bueno for sensitive skin because of how I did a dry shave. Not going to lie, but electric razors and my face do not get along whatsoever. However, I read how this can do a wet shave too, and with a little bit of lather on my baby soft skin... BOOM! It was magic!!! It honestly felt that Stevie Wonder entered my bathroom and started singing to me as I was filled with so much glee.
customer_reviews.author: Jevon Correia

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my Phisco Shaver. So far, it has exceeded expectations. It seems well built, well designed and gives a good shave. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Zwiebel

customer_reviews.title: Charging issue, now resolved
customer_reviews.text: Won’t charge after 3 months...was good, now unusable. EDIT: Was contacted by the company to offer a full money back or replacement per their 15 month guarantee. However, I was able to get another USB cord that did respond to the shaver so my issue was resolved. I thought it was really great that the company reached out to me after my 3 star review so I am changing this to a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: All Boys!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product with such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I normally use other brand name shaver for my everyday use. This product is recommended by a close friend. At the beginning, I was hesitant. After reading the customer reviews, I decided to have a try. The shaver was shipped quickly after just 1 day. I opened it and charged the battery fully for my first use. The shaving is surprisingly smooth without any difference to other brand name. The humming sound is quiet and comfortable. The battery life is satisfactory. So far I only charged once. I am pretty happy with the product and want to recommend it to anyone who wants to have a try.
customer_reviews.author: Lijun Li

customer_reviews.title: Crappy blades pull
customer_reviews.text: This razor didn't work well for me. The issues was the blades that came with it. They pull. I ended up putting my old norelco blades in it much better. The build quality is nice but the blades are crap.
customer_reviews.author: D. Germann

customer_reviews.title: As Good as the Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this shaver for a short time, but it's the closest match to an expensive Norelco shaver that I have purchased so far. It Provides a close, comfortable shave and does so smoothly and quietly. The battery provides many shaves on a single charge. All in all, an excellent shaver for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nalven

product_meta.title: Phisco Electric Shaver Razor for Men 2 in 1 Beard Trimmer Wet Dry Waterproof Mens Rotary Shaver USB Quick Rechargeable Shaving Razor - Best Gift for Dad, Boyfriend …
feature_bullets: QUICK-CHARGE & LONG-LASTING BATTERY - 1 hour charge up to 120 min shaving time (about 30 shavings), 2 minutes quick charge for a single shave, Lithium-ion battery makes shave longer with every charge, powerful and long-lasting
STRONG POWER & MUTE HIGH-SPEED MOTOR - High Speed Motor up to 2800RPM, provides a quick and clean shave, save more time, while with very low noise, you even can have a short nap when shaving

PRECISION SHAVING HEADS - With double-track ultra thin spherical cutter net and self-sharpening steel blade, this 3D rotary shaver has double wider coverage than single track, delivers a more smooth, close and sharp shave. Suitable for men of all ages who need shaving

LED INDICATORS & POP-UP TRIMMER - With LED lights up, it can show Battery percentage, Charge Indicator, Cleaning indicator and Safe lock indicator, it can remind you about the battery capacity, extra trimmer is perfect for side-burns and moustaches.

WATERPROOF & USE WET&DRY - The whole body washable allows you enjoy a wet and dry shave even in the shower with gel and foam for a better shaving experience, cleaning by water does not mean any danger because all electronic parts inside the shaver are protected.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
